CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rotate the fractal along the Z axis, turning it into a goopy mess.
CONTROLS.NAME: rot_on

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rotate to the right or left.
CONTROLS.NAME: rot_direction

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Changes from a short to long lens perspective.
CONTROLS.NAME: perspective

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Multiplier on the z-axis. Similar, but different from perspective.
CONTROLS.NAME: z_depth

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rotate the camera downwards by 90 degrees.
CONTROLS.NAME: down_rot

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rotate the camera rightwards by 90 degrees.
CONTROLS.NAME: right_rot

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Changes the number of iterations that create the scaffold. Only 4 options here. Heavily modifies how the rotation in psych behaves as well.
CONTROLS.NAME: iters

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Stretches and distorts the fractal. Default is 50/50 right in the middle.
CONTROLS.NAME: scale_xy
